solutions.description: Store, manage, and share passwords, passkeys, credit cards, and more.

solutions.name: Passbolt
solutions.description: The open source password manager for teams. Passbolt simplifies password management, helps prevent data loss, stores data securely and enables secure password sharing.

solutions.name: Proxmox
solutions.description: Enterprise virtualization with backing up and restoring VMs, containers, and physical hosts.

solutions.name: Proton Mail
solutions.description: Encrypted email service based in Switzerland.

solutions.name: Proton VPN
solutions.description: Anonymous VPN service that keeps your browsing history private without logging.

solutions.name: Mullvad
solutions.description: Free the internet from mass surveillance and censorship. Fight for privacy with Mullvad VPN.

solutions.name: Proton Drive
solutions.description: End-to-end encryption for your cloud storage.

solutions.name: Seafile
solutions.description: Seafile is an open source, self-hosted file sync and share solution with high performance and reliability. Sync, access, and collaborate on files on your own server or private cloud.

solutions.name: Syncthing
solutions.description: Syncthing is an open-source tool for continuous file synchronization between devices. It ensures data privacy and security through end-to-end encryption and decentralization.

solutions.name: ownCloud
solutions.description: ownCloud, your file platform. The most essential business tool for enterprise-grade file sync and share.

solutions.name: Proton Pass
solutions.description: Store, share and auto-login your accounts using end-to-end encryption.

solutions.name: Proton Calendar
solutions.description: Your calendar is a record of your life. Proton Calendar helps keep it private.

solutions.name: Nextcloud
solutions.description: Self-hosted file storage and sync platform with powerful collaboration capabilities with desktop, mobile and web interfaces.

solutions.name: OrangeHRM
solutions.description: HRIS expirience from talent management to culture, to people management and compensation.

solutions.name: Duplicati
solutions.description: Backup client that securely encrypts and backs up your data to cloud storage services like Amazon S3, OneDrive, Google Drive, etc.
